notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: All relevant data are within the paper and its Supporting Information Files. Additional data on the model and malaria systems are available in "The dynamics, transmission, and population impacts of avian malaria in native Hawaiian birds: a modeling approach" (Samuel et al. 2011) and "Will a warmer and wetter future cause extinction of native Hawaiian forest birds?" (Liao et al. 2015).
